Text:
Thanx adrianmarcato! Thanx for all the great soundtracks.

If you're into Bergman, as you posted "The film music of Ingmar Bergman", you shouldn't miss this:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5054461/SPARKS_-_Seduction_of_Ingemar_Bergman_2009

It's i a musical about Bergman, written by The Sparks for Swedish National Radio. It was broadcasted for the first time on the 14 of August, 2009.

It is justa as bizarre as it is wonderful.
Thanks for the tip UmbraFlundra, I'm downloading it now. Bergman is my favorite filmmaker! "I hope I never get so old I get religious."

Had this on cassette when it first came out, have no idea where it is now after numerous moves.

Anyone have any idea if the movie's available somewhere?

Thanks for this.

DD2K2
